00023 /*
00024 
00025  Please be careful when changing this file. It's the result of roughly
00026  78 hours of work, where approximately 14 liters of coffee where consumed,
00027  the keyboard been replaced 4 times due to worn-out cut'n'paste combo keys
00028  and two ambulance calls because of near-fatal RSI syndroms. Every line has
00029  been thought of carefully and has been highly optimized by 3 members of a
00030  Zen buddhist religion in a Tibetian monastry. Thus modifications, as they
00031  touch the core OpenGL support, could severely affect performance. Beware!
00032  Okay, maybe this was a bit exagerated... this file is autogenerated.
00033  
00034  */
00035 
00040 #ifndef __CS_GLEXTENSIONMANAGER_H__
00041 #define __CS_GLEXTENSIONMANAGER_H__
00042 
00043 /**********************************************************************
00044  * Begin system-specific stuff.
00045  */
00046 #if defined(__BEOS__)
00047 #include <stdlib.h>     /* to get some BeOS-isms */
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 #if !defined(OPENSTEP) && (defined(NeXT) || defined(NeXT_PDO))
00051 #define OPENSTEP
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__WIN32__) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00055 #define __WIN32__
00056 #endif
00057 
00058 #if !defined(GLAPI)
00059 #  if !defined(OPENSTEP) && (defined(__WIN32__) && !defined(__CYGWIN__))
00060 #    if defined(_MSC_VER) && defined(BUILD_GL32) /* tag specify we're building mesa as a DLL */
00061 #      define GLAPI __declspec(dllexport)
00062 #    elif defined(_MSC_VER) && defined(_DLL) /* tag specifying we're building for DLL runtime support */
00063 #      define GLAPI __declspec(dllimport)
00064 #    else /* for use with static link lib build of Win32 edition only */
00065 #      define GLAPI extern
00066 #    endif /* _STATIC_MESA support */
00067 #    define GLAPIENTRY __stdcall
00068 #  else
00069 /* non-Windows compilation */
00070 /* In most cases, it seems safest to avoid defining these at all. Please report
00071  *  if this causes trouble.
00072  * #define GLAPI extern
00073  * #define GLAPI
00074  * #define GLAPIENTRY
00075  */
00076 #  endif /* WIN32 / CYGWIN bracket */
00077 #endif
00078 
00079 //#if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(_WINGDI_) && !defined(__CYGWIN__) && !defined(_GNU_H_WINDOWS32_DEFINES) && !defined(OPENSTEP)
00080 //#include <gl/mesa_wgl.h>
00081 //#endif
00082 
00083 #if defined(macintosh) && PRAGMA_IMPORT_SUPPORTED
00084 #pragma import on
00085 #endif
00086 
00087 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(APIENTRY) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00088 #define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN 1
00089 #include <windows.h>
00090 #endif
00091 
00092 #ifndef csAPIENTRY
00093 #ifndef APIENTRY
00094 #define csAPIENTRY
00095 #else
00096 #define csAPIENTRY APIENTRY
00097 #endif
00098 #endif
00099 
00100 // In CS, we ignore Cygwin's graphical offerings and use the Windows versions.
00101 #if defined(__CYGWIN__) && !defined(_WIN32)
00102 #define _WIN32
00103 #endif
00104 
00105 /*
00106  * End system-specific stuff.
00107  **********************************************************************/
00108 
00109 #ifdef DOXYGEN_RUN
00110 typedef void GLvoid;
00111 typedef int GLint;
00112 typedef uint GLuint;
00113 typedef int GLsizei;
00114 typedef enum GLenum;
00115 typedef float GLfloat;
00116 typedef double GLdouble;
00117 typedef unsigned char GLubyte;
00118 #  define _WIN32
00119 #else
00120 #  if defined(CS_OPENGL_PATH)
00121 #    include CS_HEADER_GLOBAL(CS_OPENGL_PATH,gl.h)
00122 #  else
00123 #    include <GL/gl.h>
00124 #  endif
00125 #endif

00721 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLACTIVETEXTURE) (GLenum texture);

00724 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD1DV) (GLenum target, const GLdouble* v);
00725 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD1F) (GLenum target, GLfloat s);
00726 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD1FV) (GLenum target, const GLfloat* v);

00728 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD1IV) (GLenum target, const GLint* v);
00729 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD1S) (GLenum target, GLshort s);

01096 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLCONVOLUTIONFILTER2D) (GLenum target, GLenum internalformat, GLsizei width, GLsizei height, GLenum format, GLenum type, const GLvoid* image);

01102 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLCOPYCONVOLUTIONFILTER2D) (GLenum target, GLenum internalformat, GLint x, GLint y, GLsizei width, GLsizei height);

01274 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD1DVARB) (GLenum target, const GLdouble* v);
01275 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD1FARB) (GLenum target, GLfloat s);

02009 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLWEIGHTBVARB) (GLint size, GLbyte* weights);
02010 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLWEIGHTSVARB) (GLint size, GLshort* weights);
02011 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLWEIGHTIVARB) (GLint size, GLint* weights);
02012 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLWEIGHTFVARB) (GLint size, GLfloat* weights);
02013 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLWEIGHTDVARB) (GLint size, GLdouble* weights);
02014 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLWEIGHTVARB) (GLint size, GLdouble* weights);

02016 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLWEIGHTUSVARB) (GLint size, GLushort* weights);

04829 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLCOMBINERINPUTNV) (GLenum stage, GLenum portion, GLenum variable, GLenum input, GLenum mapping, GLenum componentUsage);
04830 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLCOMBINEROUTPUTNV) (GLenum stage, GLenum portion, GLenum abOutput, GLenum cdOutput, GLenum sumOutput, GLenum scale, GLenum bias, GLboolean abDotProduct, GLboolean cdDotProduct, GLboolean muxSum);

09675 typedef GLboolean (csAPIENTRY* csGLISRENDERBUFFEREXT) (GLuint renderbuffer);
09676 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLBINDRENDERBUFFEREXT) (GLenum target, GLuint renderbuffer);
09677 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLDELETERENDERBUFFERSEXT) (GLsizei n, const GLuint* renderbuffers);
09678 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGENRENDERBUFFERSEXT) (GLsizei n, GLuint* renderbuffers);
09679 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLRENDERBUFFERSTORAGEEXT) (GLenum target, GLenum internalformat, GLsizei width, GLsizei height);
09680 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETRENDERBUFFERPARAMETERIVEXT) (GLenum target, GLenum pname, GLint* params);
09681 typedef GLboolean (csAPIENTRY* csGLISFRAMEBUFFEREXT) (GLuint framebuffer);
09682 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLBINDFRAMEBUFFEREXT) (GLenum target, GLuint framebuffer);
09683 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLDELETEFRAMEBUFFERSEXT) (GLsizei n, const GLuint* framebuffers);
09684 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGENFRAMEBUFFERSEXT) (GLsizei n, GLuint* framebuffers);
09685 typedef GLenum (csAPIENTRY* csGLCHECKFRAMEBUFFERSTATUSEXT) (GLenum target);
09686 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLFRAMEBUFFERTEXTURE1DEXT) (GLenum target, GLenum attachment, GLenum textarget, GLuint texture, GLint level);
09687 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLFRAMEBUFFERTEXTURE2DEXT) (GLenum target, GLenum attachment, GLenum textarget, GLuint texture, GLint level);
09688 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLFRAMEBUFFERTEXTURE3DEXT) (GLenum target, GLenum attachment, GLenum textarget, GLuint texture, GLint level, GLint zoffset);
09689 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLFRAMEBUFFERRENDERBUFFEREXT) (GLenum target, GLenum attachment, GLenum renderbuffertarget, GLuint renderbuffer);
09690 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETFRAMEBUFFERATTACHMENTPARAMETERIVEXT) (GLenum target, GLenum attachment, GLenum pname, GLint* params);
09691 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGENERATEMIPMAPEXT) (GLenum target);

09730 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLSTRINGMARKERGREMEDY) (GLsizei len, const GLvoid* string);
09731 
09735 // end of definitions
09736 
09737 #ifdef CS_DEBUG
09738 #  define REPORT_MISSING_ENTRIES true
09739 #else
09740 #  define REPORT_MISSING_ENTRIES false
09741 #endif
09742 
09743 #define EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(nameNC, nameUC) \
09744       funcTest = ((nameNC = (cs##nameUC) gl->GetProcAddress (#nameNC)) != 0); \
09745       if (!funcTest && config->GetBool ("Video.OpenGL.ReportMissingEntries", \
09746         REPORT_MISSING_ENTRIES)) \
09747       { \
09748         Report (msgExtRetrieveFail, #nameNC); \
09749       } \
09750       allclear &= funcTest; \
09751 
09752 #define EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT(exttype, nameNC) \
09753       if (CS_##nameNC = allclear) \
09754       { \
09755         CS_##nameNC &= config->GetBool (cfgkey, true); \
09756         if (CS_##nameNC) \
09757         { \
09758           Report (msgExtFoundAndUsed, exttype, ext); \
09759         } \
09760         else \
09761         { \
09762           Report (msgExtFoundAndNotUsed, exttype, ext); \
09763         } \
09764       } \
09765       else \
09766       { \
09767         Report (msgExtInitFail, exttype, ext); \
09768       } 
09769

14604 };
14605

14608 {

15207   bool tested_CS_GL_SGIS_texture_lod;
15208   bool tested_CS_GL_SGIS_depth_texture;
15209   bool tested_CS_GL_SGIX_fog_offset;
15210   bool tested_CS_GL_SGIX_interlace;
15211   bool tested_CS_GL_SGIX_shadow_ambient;
15212   bool tested_CS_GL_SGI_color_matrix;
15213   bool tested_CS_GL_SGI_color_table;
15214   bool tested_CS_GL_SGI_texture_color_table;
15215   bool tested_CS_GL_SUN_vertex;
15216   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_fragment_program;
15217   bool tested_CS_GL_ATI_text_fragment_shader;
15218   bool tested_CS_GL_APPLE_client_storage;
15219   bool tested_CS_GL_APPLE_element_array;
15220   bool tested_CS_GL_APPLE_fence;
15221   bool tested_CS_GL_APPLE_vertex_array_object;
15222   bool tested_CS_GL_APPLE_vertex_array_range;
15223   bool tested_CS_WGL_ARB_pixel_format;
15224   bool tested_CS_WGL_ARB_make_current_read;
15225   bool tested_CS_WGL_ARB_pbuffer;
15226   bool tested_CS_WGL_EXT_swap_control;
15227   bool tested_CS_WGL_ARB_render_texture;
15228   bool tested_CS_WGL_EXT_extensions_string;
15229   bool tested_CS_WGL_EXT_make_current_read;
15230   bool tested_CS_WGL_EXT_pbuffer;
15231   bool tested_CS_WGL_EXT_pixel_format;
15232   bool tested_CS_WGL_I3D_digital_video_control;
15233   bool tested_CS_WGL_I3D_gamma;
15234   bool tested_CS_WGL_I3D_genlock;
15235   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_matrix_palette;
15236   bool tested_CS_GL_NV_element_array;
15237   bool tested_CS_GL_NV_float_buffer;
15238   bool tested_CS_GL_NV_fragment_program;
15239   bool tested_CS_GL_NV_primitive_restart;
15240   bool tested_CS_GL_NV_vertex_program2;
15241   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_vertex_buffer_object;
15242   bool tested_CS_GL_ATI_separate_stencil;
15243   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_texture_non_power_of_two;
15244   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_point_sprite;
15245   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_shading_language_100;
15246   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_shader_objects;
15247   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_fragment_shader;
15248   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_vertex_shader;
15249   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object;
15250   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_texture_rectangle;
15251   bool tested_CS_GL_EXT_framebuffer_object;
15252   bool tested_CS_GL_EXT_pixel_buffer_object;
15253   bool tested_CS_GL_GREMEDY_string_marker;
15254 
15255 };
15256 
15261 struct csGLExtensionManager : public csGLExtensionFunctions,
15262                               public csGLExtensionFlags
15263 {
15264 private:
15265   iObjectRegistry* object_reg;
15266   csConfigAccess config;
15267   iOpenGLInterface* gl;
15268   
15269   const char* extstrGL;
15270   const char* msgExtRetrieveFail;
15271   const char* msgExtFoundAndUsed;
15272   const char* msgExtFoundAndNotUsed;
15273   const char* msgExtInitFail;
15274   const char* msgExtNotFound;
15275   const char* msgDependencyNotFound;
15276 #ifdef __WIN32__
15277   const char* extstrWGL;
15278   
15279   void SetupWGLextStr (HDC hDC)
15280   {
15281     if (extstrWGL != 0) return;
15282   
15283     if (!tested_CS_WGL_ARB_extensions_string) InitWGL_ARB_extensions_string (hDC);
15284     if (CS_WGL_ARB_extensions_string)
15285     {
15286       extstrWGL = wglGetExtensionsStringARB (hDC);
15287     }
15288     else
15289     {
15290       extstrWGL = extstrGL;
15291     }
15292   }
15293 #endif
15294 
15295   void Report (const char* msg, ...)
15296   {
15297     csRef<iVerbosityManager> verbosemgr (
15298       CS_QUERY_REGISTRY (object_reg, iVerbosityManager));
15299     
15300     if (!verbosemgr->CheckFlag ("renderer"))
15301       return;
15302     
15303     va_list arg;
15304     va_start (arg, msg);
15305     csRef<iReporter> rep (CS_QUERY_REGISTRY (object_reg, iReporter));
15306     if (rep)
15307       rep->ReportV (CS_REPORTER_SEVERITY_NOTIFY,
15308          "crystalspace.canvas.opengl.extmgr", msg, arg);
15309     else
15310     {
15311       csPrintfV (msg, arg);
15312       csPrintf ("\n");
15313     }
15314     va_end (arg);
15315   }
15316 
15317 public:
15318   void Initialize (iObjectRegistry* object_reg, iGraphics2D* g2d)
15319   {
15320     csGLExtensionManager::object_reg = object_reg;
15321     gl = csRef<iOpenGLInterface>
15322       (SCF_QUERY_INTERFACE (g2d, iOpenGLInterface));
15323     // Low priority so canvas/renderer cfgs may override the settings
15324     config.AddConfig (object_reg, "/config/glext.cfg", true,
15325       iConfigManager::ConfigPriorityPlugin - 1);
15326   }
15327   
15328   void Open () 
15329   { 
15330     extstrGL = (const char*)glGetString (GL_EXTENSIONS);
15331   }
15332   
15333   void Close () { }
15334 public:
15335   void Reset ()
15336   {
15337     extstrGL = 0;
15338 #ifdef __WIN32__
15339     extstrWGL = 0;
15340 #endif
15341 
15342     memset ((csGLExtensionFunctions*)this, 0, 
15343       sizeof (csGLExtensionFunctions));
15344     memset ((csGLExtensionFlags*)this, 0, sizeof (csGLExtensionFlags));
15345   }
15346   
15347   csGLExtensionManager () : object_reg (0), gl (0)
15348   {
15349     msgExtRetrieveFail = "Failed to retrieve %s";
15350     msgExtFoundAndUsed = "%s Extension '%s' found and used.";
15351     msgExtFoundAndNotUsed = "%s Extension '%s' found, but not used.";
15352     msgExtInitFail = "%s Extension '%s' failed to initialize.";
15353     msgExtNotFound = "%s Extension '%s' not found.";
15354     msgDependencyNotFound = "%s Extension '%s' depends on '%s' which did "
15355       "not initialize.";
15356     
15357     Reset ();
15358   }
15359   
15361   void InitGL_version_1_2 ()
15362   {
15363     if (tested_CS_GL_version_1_2) return;
15364     if (!extstrGL) return;
15365     tested_CS_GL_version_1_2 = true;
15366     const char* ext = "GL_version_1_2";
15367 
15368     char cfgkey[26 + 14 + 1];
15369     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
15370     
15371     CS_GL_version_1_2 = true;
15372 
15373     bool allclear, funcTest;
15374     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
15375     bool init = CS_GL_version_1_2;
15376     allclear = true;
15377     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
15378     {
15379       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glDrawRangeElements, GLDRAWRANGEELEMENTS);
15380       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexImage3D, GLTEXIMAGE3D);
15381       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexSubImage3D, GLTEXSUBIMAGE3D);
15382       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCopyTexSubImage3D, GLCOPYTEXSUBIMAGE3D);
15383 
15384       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_version_1_2)
15385     }
15386     else
15387     {
15388       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
15389     }
15390   }
15391   
15393   void InitGL_version_1_3 ()
15394   {
15395     if (tested_CS_GL_version_1_3) return;
15396     if (!extstrGL) return;
15397     tested_CS_GL_version_1_3 = true;
15398     const char* ext = "GL_version_1_3";
15399 
15400     char cfgkey[26 + 14 + 1];
15401     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
15402     
15403     CS_GL_version_1_3 = true;
15404 
15405     bool allclear, funcTest;
15406     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
15407     bool init = CS_GL_version_1_3;
15408     allclear = true;
15409     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
15410     {
15411       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glActiveTexture, GLACTIVETEXTURE);
15412       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glClientActiveTexture, GLCLIENTACTIVETEXTURE);
15413       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1d, GLMULTITEXCOORD1D);
15414       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1dv, GLMULTITEXCOORD1DV);
15415       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1f, GLMULTITEXCOORD1F);
15416       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1fv, GLMULTITEXCOORD1FV);
15417       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1i, GLMULTITEXCOORD1I);
15418       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1iv, GLMULTITEXCOORD1IV);
15419       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1s, GLMULTITEXCOORD1S);
15420       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1sv, GLMULTITEXCOORD1SV);
15421       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2d, GLMULTITEXCOORD2D);
15422       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2dv, GLMULTITEXCOORD2DV);
15423       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2f, GLMULTITEXCOORD2F);
15424       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2fv, GLMULTITEXCOORD2FV);
15425       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2i, GLMULTITEXCOORD2I);
15426       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2iv, GLMULTITEXCOORD2IV);
15427       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2s, GLMULTITEXCOORD2S);
15428       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2sv, GLMULTITEXCOORD2SV);
15429       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3d, GLMULTITEXCOORD3D);
15430       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3dv, GLMULTITEXCOORD3DV);
15431       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3f, GLMULTITEXCOORD3F);
15432       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3fv, GLMULTITEXCOORD3FV);
15433       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3i, GLMULTITEXCOORD3I);
15434       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3iv, GLMULTITEXCOORD3IV);
15435       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3s, GLMULTITEXCOORD3S);
15436       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3sv, GLMULTITEXCOORD3SV);
15437       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4d, GLMULTITEXCOORD4D);
15438       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4dv, GLMULTITEXCOORD4DV);
15439       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4f, GLMULTITEXCOORD4F);
15440       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4fv, GLMULTITEXCOORD4FV);
15441       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4i, GLMULTITEXCOORD4I);
15442       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4iv, GLMULTITEXCOORD4IV);
15443       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4s, GLMULTITEXCOORD4S);
15444       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4sv, GLMULTITEXCOORD4SV);
15445       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glLoadTransposeMatrixf, GLLOADTRANSPOSEMATRIXF);
15446       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glLoadTransposeMatrixd, GLLOADTRANSPOSEMATRIXD);
15447       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultTransposeMatrixf, GLMULTTRANSPOSEMATRIXF);
15448       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultTransposeMatrixd, GLMULTTRANSPOSEMATRIXD);
15449       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glSampleCoverage, GLSAMPLECOVERAGE);
15450       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCompressedTexImage3D, GLCOMPRESSEDTEXIMAGE3D);
15451       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCompressedTexImage2D, GLCOMPRESSEDTEXIMAGE2D);
15452       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCompressedTexImage1D, GLCOMPRESSEDTEXIMAGE1D);
15453       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCompressedTexSubImage3D, GLCOMPRESSEDTEXSUBIMAGE3D);
15454       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCompressedTexSubImage2D, GLCOMPRESSEDTEXSUBIMAGE2D);
15455       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCompressedTexSubImage1D, GLCOMPRESSEDTEXSUBIMAGE1D);
15456       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetCompressedTexImage, GLGETCOMPRESSEDTEXIMAGE);
15457 
15458       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_version_1_3)
15459     }
15460     else
15461     {
15462       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
15463     }
15464   }
15465   
15468   void InitGL_ARB_imaging ()
15469   {
15470     if (tested_CS_GL_ARB_imaging) return;
15471     if (!extstrGL) return;
15472     tested_CS_GL_ARB_imaging = true;
15473     const char* ext = "GL_ARB_imaging";
15474 
15475     char cfgkey[26 + 14 + 1];
15476     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
15477     
15478     CS_GL_ARB_imaging = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
15479 
15480     bool allclear, funcTest;
15481     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
15482     bool init = CS_GL_ARB_imaging;
15483     allclear = true;
15484     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
15485     {
15486       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glColorTable, GLCOLORTABLE);
15487       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glColorTableParameterfv, GLCOLORTABLEPARAMETERFV);
15488       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glColorTableParameteriv, GLCOLORTABLEPARAMETERIV);
15489       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCopyColorTable, GLCOPYCOLORTABLE);
15490       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetColorTable, GLGETCOLORTABLE);
15491       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetColorTableParameterfv, GLGETCOLORTABLEPARAMETERFV);
15492       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetColorTableParameteriv, GLGETCOLORTABLEPARAMETERIV);
15493       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glColorSubTable, GLCOLORSUBTABLE);
15494       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCopyColorSubTable, GLCOPYCOLORSUBTABLE);
15495       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glConvolutionFilter1D, GLCONVOLUTIONFILTER1D);
15496       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glConvolutionFilter2D, GLCONVOLUTIONFILTER2D);
15497       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glConvolutionParameterf, GLCONVOLUTIONPARAMETERF);
15498       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glConvolutionParameterfv, GLCONVOLUTIONPARAMETERFV);
15499       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glConvolutionParameteri, GLCONVOLUTIONPARAMETERI);
15500       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glConvolutionParameteriv, GLCONVOLUTIONPARAMETERIV);
15501       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCopyConvolutionFilter1D, GLCOPYCONVOLUTIONFILTER1D);
15502       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCopyConvolutionFilter2D, GLCOPYCONVOLUTIONFILTER2D);
15503       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetConvolutionFilter, GLGETCONVOLUTIONFILTER);
15504       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetConvolutionParameterfv, GLGETCONVOLUTIONPARAMETERFV);
15505       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetConvolutionParameteriv, GLGETCONVOLUTIONPARAMETERIV);
15506       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetSeparableFilter, GLGETSEPARABLEFILTER);
15507       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glSeparableFilter2D, GLSEPARABLEFILTER2D);
15508       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetHistogram, GLGETHISTOGRAM);
15509       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetHistogramParameterfv, GLGETHISTOGRAMPARAMETERFV);
15510       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetHistogramParameteriv, GLGETHISTOGRAMPARAMETERIV);
15511       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetMinmax, GLGETMINMAX);
15512       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetMinmaxParameterfv, GLGETMINMAXPARAMETERFV);
15513       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetMinmaxParameteriv, GLGETMINMAXPARAMETERIV);
15514       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glHistogram, GLHISTOGRAM);
15515       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMinmax, GLMINMAX);
15516       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glResetHistogram, GLRESETHISTOGRAM);
15517       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glResetMinmax, GLRESETMINMAX);
15518       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glBlendColor, GLBLENDCOLOR);
15519       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glBlendEquation, GLBLENDEQUATION);
15520 
15521       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_ARB_imaging)
15522     }
15523     else
15524     {
15525       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
15526     }
15527   }
15528   
15531   void InitGL_ARB_multitexture ()
15532   {
15533     if (tested_CS_GL_ARB_multitexture) return;
15534     if (!extstrGL) return;
15535     tested_CS_GL_ARB_multitexture = true;
15536     const char* ext = "GL_ARB_multitexture";
15537

15539     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
15540     
15541     CS_GL_ARB_multitexture = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
15542 
15543     bool allclear, funcTest;
15544     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
15545     bool init = CS_GL_ARB_multitexture;
15546     allclear = true;
15547     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
15548     {
15549       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glActiveTextureARB, GLACTIVETEXTUREARB);
15550       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glClientActiveTextureARB, GLCLIENTACTIVETEXTUREARB);

15552       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1dvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD1DVARB);
15553       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1fARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD1FARB);
15554       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1fvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD1FVARB);
15555       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1iARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD1IARB);
15556       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1ivARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD1IVARB);
15557       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1sARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD1SARB);
15558       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1svARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD1SVARB);
15559       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2dARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2DARB);
15560       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2dvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2DVARB);
15561       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2fARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2FARB);
15562       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2fvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2FVARB);
15563       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2iARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2IARB);
15564       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2ivARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2IVARB);
15565       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2sARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2SARB);
15566       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2svARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2SVARB);
15567       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3dARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3DARB);
15568       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3dvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3DVARB);
15569       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3fARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3FARB);
15570       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3fvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3FVARB);
15571       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3iARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3IARB);
15572       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3ivARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3IVARB);
15573       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3sARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3SARB);
15574       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3svARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3SVARB);
15575       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4dARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4DARB);
15576       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4dvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4DVARB);
15577       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4fARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4FARB);
15578       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4fvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4FVARB);
15579       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4iARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4IARB);
15580       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4ivARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4IVARB);
15581       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4sARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4SARB);
15582       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4svARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4SVARB);
15583 
15584       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_ARB_multitexture)
15585     }
15586     else
15587     {
15588       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
15589     }
15590   }

15597     if (!extstrGL) return;
15598     tested_CS_GL_ARB_transpose_matrix = true;
15599     const char* ext = "GL_ARB_transpose_matrix";
15600 
15601     char cfgkey[26 + 23 + 1];
15602     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
15603     
15604     CS_GL_ARB_transpose_matrix = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
15605 
15606     bool allclear, funcTest;
15607     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
15608     bool init = CS_GL_ARB_transpose_matrix;
15609     allclear = true;
15610     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
15611     {
15612       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glLoadTransposeMatrixfARB, GLLOADTRANSPOSEMATRIXFARB);
15613       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glLoadTransposeMatrixdARB, GLLOADTRANSPOSEMATRIXDARB);
15614       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultTransposeMatrixfARB, GLMULTTRANSPOSEMATRIXFARB);
15615       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultTransposeMatrixdARB, GLMULTTRANSPOSEMATRIXDARB);
15616 
15617       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_ARB_transpose_matrix)
15618     }
15619     else
15620     {
15621       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
15622     }
15623   }

15654   
15657   void InitGL_ARB_texture_env_add ()
15658   {
15659     if (tested_CS_GL_ARB_texture_env_add) return;
15660     if (!extstrGL) return;
15661     tested_CS_GL_ARB_texture_env_add = true;
15662     const char* ext = "GL_ARB_texture_env_add";
15663 
15664     char cfgkey[26 + 22 + 1];
15665     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
15666     
15667     CS_GL_ARB_texture_env_add = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
15668 
15669     bool allclear, funcTest;
15670     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
15671     bool init = CS_GL_ARB_texture_env_add;
15672     allclear = true;
15673     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
15674     {
15675 
15676       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_ARB_texture_env_add)
15677     }
15678     else
15679     {
15680       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
15681     }
15682   }

15688   {
15689     if (tested_CS_WGL_ARB_extensions_string) return;
15690     tested_CS_WGL_ARB_extensions_string = true;
15691     const char* ext = "WGL_ARB_extensions_string";
15692     char cfgkey[26 + 25 + 1];
15693     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
15694     
15695     CS_WGL_ARB_extensions_string = true;
15696 
15697     bool allclear, funcTest;
15698     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
15699     bool init = CS_WGL_ARB_extensions_string;
15700     allclear = true;
15701     if (init)
15702     {
15703       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(wglGetExtensionsStringARB, WGLGETEXTENSIONSSTRINGARB);
15704 
15705       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("WGL", WGL_ARB_extensions_string)
15706       CS_WGL_ARB_extensions_string &= allclear;
15707     }
15708     else
15709     {
15710       Report (msgExtNotFound, "WGL", ext);
15711     }
15712   }

16199       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetVertexAttribPointervARB, GLGETVERTEXATTRIBPOINTERVARB);
16200       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glIsProgramARB, GLISPROGRAMARB);
16201

17386       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glSetLocalConstantEXT, GLSETLOCALCONSTANTEXT);

17388       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glVariantsvEXT, GLVARIANTSVEXT);
17389       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glVariantivEXT, GLVARIANTIVEXT);

17399       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glBindMaterialParameterEXT, GLBINDMATERIALPARAMETEREXT);

17404       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetVariantBooleanvEXT, GLGETVARIANTBOOLEANVEXT);
17405       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetVariantIntegervEXT, GLGETVARIANTINTEGERVEXT);
17406       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetVariantFloatvEXT, GLGETVARIANTFLOATVEXT);

18993       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos4fvMESA, GLWINDOWPOS4FVMESA);

18995

18997     }
18998     else
18999     {
19000       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
19001     }
19002   }

19547       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord2fColor3fVertex3fSUN, GLTEXCOORD2FCOLOR3FVERTEX3FSUN);
19548       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord2fColor3fVertex3fvSUN, GLTEXCOORD2FCOLOR3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
19549       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord2fNormal3fVertex3fSUN, GLTEXCOORD2FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FSUN);

19551       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord2fColor4fNormal3fVertex3fSUN, GLTEXCOORD2FCOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FSUN);
19552       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord2fColor4fNormal3fVertex3fvSUN, GLTEXCOORD2FCOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
19553       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord4fColor4fNormal3fVertex4fSUN, GLTEXCOORD4FCOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX4FSUN);
19554       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord4fColor4fNormal3fVertex4fvSUN, GLTEXCOORD4FCOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX4FVSUN);

19559       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiColor3fVertex3fSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUICOLOR3FVERTEX3FSUN);
19560       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiColor3fVertex3fvSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUICOLOR3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
19561       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiNormal3fVertex3fSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUINORMAL3FVERTEX3FSUN);
19562       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiNormal3fVertex3fvSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUINORMAL3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
19563       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiColor4fNormal3fVertex3fSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUICOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FSUN);
19564       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiColor4fNormal3fVertex3fvSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUICOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
19565       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiTexCoord2fVertex3fSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUITEXCOORD2FVERTEX3FSUN);
19566       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiTexCoord2fVertex3fvSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUITEXCOORD2FVERTEX3FVSUN);
19567       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiTexCoord2fNormal3fVertex3fSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUITEXCOORD2FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FSUN);
19568       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiTexCoord2fNormal3fVertex3fvSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUITEXCOORD2FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
19569       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiTexCoord2fColor4fNormal3fVertex3fSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUITEXCOORD2FCOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FSUN);
19570       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiTexCoord2fColor4fNormal3fVertex3fvSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUITEXCOORD2FCOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
19571 
19572       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_SUN_vertex)
19573     }

19577     }

20115

20606   void InitGL_ARB_shader_objects ()
20607   {
20608     if (tested_CS_GL_ARB_shader_objects) return;
20609     if (!extstrGL) return;
20610     tested_CS_GL_ARB_shader_objects = true;
20611     const char* ext = "GL_ARB_shader_objects";
20612 
20613     char cfgkey[26 + 21 + 1];
20614     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
20615     
20616     CS_GL_ARB_shader_objects = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
20617 
20618     bool allclear, funcTest;
20619     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
20620     bool init = CS_GL_ARB_shader_objects;
20621     allclear = true;
20622     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
20623     {
20624       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glDeleteObjectARB, GLDELETEOBJECTARB);
20625       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetHandleARB, GLGETHANDLEARB);
20626       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glDetachObjectARB, GLDETACHOBJECTARB);
20627       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCreateShaderObjectARB, GLCREATESHADEROBJECTARB);
20628       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glShaderSourceARB, GLSHADERSOURCEARB);
20629       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCompileShaderARB, GLCOMPILESHADERARB);
20630       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCreateProgramObjectARB, GLCREATEPROGRAMOBJECTARB);
20631       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glAttachObjectARB, GLATTACHOBJECTARB);
20632       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glLinkProgramARB, GLLINKPROGRAMARB);
20633       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUseProgramObjectARB, GLUSEPROGRAMOBJECTARB);
20634       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glValidateProgramARB, GLVALIDATEPROGRAMARB);
20635       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform1fARB, GLUNIFORM1FARB);
20636       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform2fARB, GLUNIFORM2FARB);
20637       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform3fARB, GLUNIFORM3FARB);
20638       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform4fARB, GLUNIFORM4FARB);
20639       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform1iARB, GLUNIFORM1IARB);
20640       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform2iARB, GLUNIFORM2IARB);
20641       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform3iARB, GLUNIFORM3IARB);
20642       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform4iARB, GLUNIFORM4IARB);
20643       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform1fvARB, GLUNIFORM1FVARB);
20644       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform2fvARB, GLUNIFORM2FVARB);
20645       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform3fvARB, GLUNIFORM3FVARB);
20646       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform4fvARB, GLUNIFORM4FVARB);
20647       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform1ivARB, GLUNIFORM1IVARB);
20648       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform2ivARB, GLUNIFORM2IVARB);
20649       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform3ivARB, GLUNIFORM3IVARB);
20650       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform4ivARB, GLUNIFORM4IVARB);
20651       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniformMatrix2fvARB, GLUNIFORMMATRIX2FVARB);
20652       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniformMatrix3fvARB, GLUNIFORMMATRIX3FVARB);
20653       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniformMatrix4fvARB, GLUNIFORMMATRIX4FVARB);
20654       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetObjectParameterfvARB, GLGETOBJECTPARAMETERFVARB);
20655       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetObjectParameterivARB, GLGETOBJECTPARAMETERIVARB);
20656       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetInfoLogARB, GLGETINFOLOGARB);
20657       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetAttachedObjectsARB, GLGETATTACHEDOBJECTSARB);

20775   void InitGL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object ()
20776   {
20777     if (tested_CS_GL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object) return;
20778     if (!extstrGL) return;
20779     tested_CS_GL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object = true;
20780     const char* ext = "GL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object";
20781     InitGL_ARB_vertex_buffer_object();
20782     if (!CS_GL_ARB_vertex_buffer_object)
20783     {
20784       Report (msgDependencyNotFound, "GL", ext, "GL_ARB_vertex_buffer_object");
20785       return;
20786     }
20787     char cfgkey[26 + 26 + 1];
20788     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
20789     
20790     CS_GL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
20791 
20792     bool allclear, funcTest;
20793     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
20794     bool init = CS_GL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object;
20795     allclear = true;
20796     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
20797     {
20798 
20799       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object)
20800     }
20801     else
20802     {
20803       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
20804     }
20805   }

20847     
20848     CS_GL_EXT_framebuffer_object = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
20849

20851     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings

20854     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
20855     {
20856       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glIsRenderbufferEXT, GLISRENDERBUFFEREXT);
20857       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glBindRenderbufferEXT, GLBINDRENDERBUFFEREXT);
20858       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glDeleteRenderbuffersEXT, GLDELETERENDERBUFFERSEXT);
20859       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGenRenderbuffersEXT, GLGENRENDERBUFFERSEXT);
20860       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glRenderbufferStorageEXT, GLRENDERBUFFERSTORAGEEXT);
20861       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetRenderbufferParameterivEXT, GLGETRENDERBUFFERPARAMETERIVEXT);
20862       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glIsFramebufferEXT, GLISFRAMEBUFFEREXT);
20863       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glBindFramebufferEXT, GLBINDFRAMEBUFFEREXT);
20864       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glDeleteFramebuffersEXT, GLDELETEFRAMEBUFFERSEXT);
20865       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGenFramebuffersEXT, GLGENFRAMEBUFFERSEXT);

20867       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glFramebufferTexture1DEXT, GLFRAMEBUFFERTEXTURE1DEXT);
20868       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glFramebufferTexture2DEXT, GLFRAMEBUFFERTEXTURE2DEXT);
20869       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glFramebufferTexture3DEXT, GLFRAMEBUFFERTEXTURE3DEXT);

20871       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetFramebufferAttachmentParameterivEXT, GLGETFRAMEBUFFERATTACHMENTPARAMETERIVEXT);
20872       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGenerateMipmapEXT, GLGENERATEMIPMAPEXT);
20873
